summary: Team members introduced themselves and confirmed availability: Jordan (QA) is available for testing, Mike (Architect) for design/architecture questions, the PM will coordinate, and the Developer is available for implementation support.

actions.task: Notify Jordan (QA) when a work item is marked Ready for testing
Coordinate team updates and schedule a meeting if required
Raise architecture or design questions to Mike (Architect) as they arise

risks.risk: Testing delays if QA is not notified when items become Ready for testing
risks.mitigation: PM or responsible developer must notify Jordan (QA) when items are marked Ready; include testing readiness in the handoff checklist.
